wiki.summary: "Religiously" is a song by American country singer Bailey Zimmerman, released on March 17, 2023, as the third single from his debut album "Religiously. The Album." The lyrics use religious imagery to express the narrator's heartbreak after a breakup. A music video was also released, highlighting the song's theme of lost love. Read more on Last.fm.
